attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To make it law that when Bank of England reduce interest rates that
Banks pass it on to the customer and 
not make the customer suffer for their mistakes
As my bank RBS has decided not pass it down to the customer.
If any body is in the same boat please sign the petition.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
